resources.string: Click to roll the die.\nEvery time you hit a six, you earn five coins.

If you bet x coins on “2 alike”, you will earn 2x coins on winning or lose 2x coins on losing.

 Similarly, the risk/reward factor is 3x for “3 alike” and 4x for “4 alike” games.

 Your wallet should have enough coins to cover any losses based on the wager amount.
